# hansard: Accessing Westminster Parliament Data

An R package to automatically fetch data from the UK Parliament API.
Ironically, Hansard data (as in speeches) is not yet accessible through
the API. To explore all available data see
<http://www.data.parliament.uk/>. Documentation for the API itself is
available [here](https://explore.data.parliament.uk/).

Like the UK parliament API, this package is a work in progress.
Additional functionalities will be added to the package as they are
developed in the API. The most up-to-date documentation for this package
will always be available at <https://docs.evanodell.com/hansard/>.

To install from CRAN run:

``` R
install.packages("hansard")
```

To install the development version run:

``` R
#install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("evanodell/hansard")
```

## Using hansard

For an introduction to `hansard`, please see the
[vignette](https://docs.evanodell.com/hansard/articles/introduction.html).

## Citing hansard

Please cite this package as:

Odell E (2017). *hansard: Provides Easy Downloading Capabilities for the
UK Parliament API*. doi:
[10.5281/zenodo.591264](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.591264), R
package version 0.8.0.9000, URL:
<https://cran.r-project.org/package=hansard>.

A BibTeX entry for LaTeX users is

``` R
  @Manual{,
    title = {{hansard}: Provides Easy Downloading Capabilities for the UK Parliament API},
    author = {Evan Odell},
    note = {R package version 0.8.0.9000},
    doi = {10.5281/zenodo.591264},
    url = {https://cran.r-project.org/package=hansard},
  }
```

### Disclaimer

This package is in no way officially related to or endorsed by the UK
Parliamentary Data Service. It is released under an MIT license. Please
note that this project is released with a [Contributor Code of
Conduct](https://github.com/evanodell/hansard/blob/master/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md).
By participating in this project you agree to abide by its terms.

Data obtained through the `hansard` package is licensed under the Open
Government License. The code in `hansard` uses the MIT license.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`all_answered_questions()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/all_answered_questions.md)
  [`hansard_all_answered_questions()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/all_answered_questions.md)
  : All answered parliamentary questions

- [`bill_publication_types`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/bill_publication_types.md)
  :

  A character vector of possible types of bill publications. For use
  with
  [`bill_publications()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/bill_publications.md)

- [`bill_publications()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/bill_publications.md)
  [`hansard_bill_publications()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/bill_publications.md)
  : Bill Publications

- [`bill_stage_types()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/bill_stage_types.md)
  [`hansard_bill_stage_types()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/bill_stage_types.md)
  : Bill Stage Types

- [`bills()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/bills.md)
  [`hansard_bills()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/bills.md)
  : Bill data

- [`commons_answered_questions()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/commons_answered_questions.md)
  [`hansard_commons_answered_questions()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/commons_answered_questions.md)
  : House of Commons answered questions

- [`commons_division_date()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/commons_division_date.md)
  [`hansard_commons_division_date()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/commons_division_date.md)
  : House of Commons Division Dates

- [`commons_divisions()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/commons_divisions.md)
  [`hansard_commons_divisions()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/commons_divisions.md)
  : House of Commons divisions

- [`commons_oral_question_times()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/commons_oral_question_times.md)
  [`hansard_commons_oral_question_times()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/commons_oral_question_times.md)
  : Commons oral question times

- [`commons_oral_questions()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/commons_oral_questions.md)
  [`hansard_commons_oral_questions()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/commons_oral_questions.md)
  : House of Commons Oral Questions

- [`commons_terms()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/commons_terms.md)
  [`hansard_commons_terms()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/commons_terms.md)
  : Parliamentary Thesaurus

- [`commons_written_questions()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/commons_written_questions.md)
  [`hansard_commons_written_questions()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/commons_written_questions.md)
  : House of Commons Written Questions

- [`constituencies()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/constituencies.md)
  [`hansard_constituencies()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/constituencies.md)
  : House of Commons constituencies

- [`early_day_motions()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/early_day_motions.md)
  [`hansard_early_day_motions()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/early_day_motions.md)
  : Early day motion data

- [`edm_text()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/edm_text.md)
  : Early Day Motion Text

- [`election_candidates()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/election_candidates.md)
  [`hansard_election_candidates()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/election_candidates.md)
  : Election candidate details

- [`election_results()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/election_results.md)
  [`hansard_election_results()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/election_results.md)
  : General and By-Election Results

- [`elections()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/elections.md)
  [`hansard_elections()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/elections.md)
  : General and By-Elections

- [`epetition()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/epetition.md)
  [`hansard_epetition()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/epetition.md)
  : Individual epetitions

- [`epetition_tibble()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/epetition_tibble.md)
  [`hansard_epetition_tibble()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/epetition_tibble.md)
  : Bulk Epetition data

- [`hansard`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/hansard.md) :
  hansard: Provides Easy Downloading Capabilities for the UK Parliament
  API

- [`lord_vote_record()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/lord_vote_record.md)
  [`hansard_lord_vote_record()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/lord_vote_record.md)
  : Voting record of members of the House of Lords

- [`lords_amendments()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/lords_amendments.md)
  [`hansard_lords_amendments()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/lords_amendments.md)
  : House of Lords Amendments.

- [`lords_attendance_date()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/lords_attendance_date.md)
  [`hansard_lords_attendance_date()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/lords_attendance_date.md)
  : House of Lords attendance by date

- [`lords_attendance_session()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/lords_attendance_session.md)
  [`hansard_lords_attendance_session()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/lords_attendance_session.md)
  : House of Lords attendance by session

- [`lords_divisions()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/lords_divisions.md)
  [`hansard_lords_divisions()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/lords_divisions.md)
  : House of Lords divisions

- [`lords_interests()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/lords_interests.md)
  [`hansard_lords_interests()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/lords_interests.md)
  : Peers' registered interests

- [`lords_sessions()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/lords_sessions.md)
  [`hansard_lords_sessions()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/lords_sessions.md)
  : Lords sessions

- [`lords_written_questions()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/lords_written_questions.md)
  [`hansard_lords_written_questions()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/lords_written_questions.md)
  : House of Lords written questions

- [`members()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/members.md)
  [`hansard_members()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/members.md)
  [`commons_members()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/members.md)
  [`hansard_commons_members()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/members.md)
  [`lords_members()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/members.md)
  [`hansard_lords_members()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/members.md)
  : Members of both houses

- [`members_search()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/members_search.md)
  [`hansard_members_search()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/members_search.md)
  : Search for an MP or Peer by name and constituency

- [`mp_edms()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/mp_edms.md)
  [`hansard_mp_edms()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/mp_edms.md)
  : Early Day Motions by MP or Peer

- [`mp_questions()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/mp_questions.md)
  [`hansard_mp_questions()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/mp_questions.md)
  : Questions asked by a given MP or MPs

- [`mp_vote_record()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/mp_vote_record.md)
  [`hansard_mp_vote_record()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/mp_vote_record.md)
  : Individual MP voting records

- [`papers_laid()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/papers_laid.md)
  [`hansard_papers_laid()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/papers_laid.md)
  : Papers laid

- [`publication_logs()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/publication_logs.md)
  [`hansard_publication_logs()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/publication_logs.md)
  : House publications

- [`research_briefings()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/research_briefings.md)
  [`hansard_research_briefings()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/research_briefings.md)
  : Parliamentary Research Briefings

- [`research_topics_list()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/research_briefings_lists.md)
  [`hansard_research_topics_list()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/research_briefings_lists.md)
  [`research_subtopics_list()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/research_briefings_lists.md)
  [`hansard_research_subtopics_list()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/research_briefings_lists.md)
  [`research_types_list()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/research_briefings_lists.md)
  [`hansard_research_types_list()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/research_briefings_lists.md)
  : Lists of research briefing topics, subtopics and types.

- [`sessions_info()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/sessions_info.md)
  [`hansard_sessions_info()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/sessions_info.md)
  : Parliamentary Session data

- [`tv_programmes()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/tv_programmes.md)
  [`hansard_tv_programmes()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/tv_programmes.md)
  [`tv_clips()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/tv_programmes.md)
  [`hansard_tv_clips()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/tv_programmes.md)
  [`tv_channels()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/tv_programmes.md)
  [`hansard_tv_channels()`](https://ropengov.github.io/hansard/reference/tv_programmes.md)
  : TV broadcast data
